turn-on-contract-data: Please enable Contract data on the Ethereum app Settings
iframe-timeout: Make sure you enable pop-ups in the browser, and that your ad blocker is not blocking the pop-up
unsupported-browser: Browser not supported! Please try using Trezor with Chrome or Firefox!
popup-failed-to-open: Popup failed to open.  Make sure you enable pop-ups in the browser, and that your ad blocker is not blocking the pop-up
safety-check-failed: Safety check failed, make sure you are using latest trezor firmware
initializing-failed: Failed to initialize, try unplugging and replugging trezor
trezor-connect-not-initialized: TrezorConnect is not yet initialized! try unplugging and replugging Trezor wallet
user-cancelled-request-device-bluetooth: User cancelled bluetooth connection.  Please try reconnecting.
operation-that-changes-interface-state-i: An operation that changes interface state is in progress.  Please wait.
connection-not-open-on-send: There is an issue with the web socket connection.  Please try again.
